inclusion.criterion: Patients with Immunoglobulin G (IgG) or Immunoglobulin A (IgA) multiple myeloma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Human leukocyte antigen (HLA) typing of recipient and donor(s) initiated.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with IgG or IgA multiple myeloma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have achieved at least a partial remission following initial conventional chemotherapy regimen or after autologous stem cell transplantation.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status greater than or equal to 80%.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction has to be greater than 50% by either multi-gated acquisition scan (MUGA) or 2-D echo.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Carbon monoxide diffusing capacity (DLCO) greater than 50% of the expected value when corrected for hemoglobin (Hb)(96).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl and a creatinine clearance greater than or equal to 50 ml/min.
inclusion.label: met
